abstract.p: Correction of October 15 article about hyper-realistic painting, which misspelled Gorney Bravin & Lee gallery and miscredited photo by Oren Slor, which also appeared in September 12 Science Times article (S)

block.p: An article on Oct. 15 about hyperrealistic painting misspelled the name of the gallery that represents the artist Alexis Rockman. It is Gorney, Bravin & Lee, not Braven.

A picture of a Rockman painting with the article carried an erroneous credit from a publicity agency. (The error also occurred on Sept. 12, when the photograph appeared in Science Times with an article about genetics and art.) The photographer was Oren Slor, and the photograph was provided by Gorney, Bravin & Lee.
An article on Oct. 15 about hyperrealistic painting misspelled the name of the gallery that represents the artist Alexis Rockman. It is Gorney, Bravin & Lee, not Braven.

A picture of a Rockman painting with the article carried an erroneous credit from a publicity agency. (The error also occurred on Sept. 12, when the photograph appeared in Science Times with an article about genetics and art.) The photographer was Oren Slor, and the photograph was provided by Gorney, Bravin & Lee.
